titleStmt.title: The cure of the kingdome, an old fashioned sermon treating of peace, truth, & loyaltie. A discovery of the diseases of the state, with a direction to the true, certaine, and only means for the recovery of health to this distressed nation. / By R.P. ...
titleStmt.author: R. P.

notesStmt.note: The words "peace, truth, & loyaltie." are bracketed together on title page; "philalexandros" is in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
